Package gw.api.admin

Class AdminUtil

java.lang.Object
gw.api.admin.AdminUtil
public class AdminUtil extends Object
Utility functions for the Admin screens.
Author:
cgross

  • Method Details

    • setCurrentUsersLanguage

      public static void setCurrentUsersLanguage(LanguageType language)
      Sets the language of the current user according to the given language type and immediately commits the change.

    • deleteLimit

      public static void deleteLimit(AuthorityLimitProfile authorityLimitProfile)
      Deletes the given authority limit profile. Makes the change but does not commit it - the change will be committed when the enclosing page is saved. If the authority limit is still in use a user displayable exception is thrown and the limit is not deleted.

    • deleteUser

      public static void deleteUser(User user)
      Deletes the given user and immediately commits the change.

    • getAllRoles

      public static Role[] getAllRoles()
      Returns all the roles in the system as entities. We could use a query to fetch the roles. But there should be at most a hundred or so roles in the system and they should all be cached so we may as well fetch all the Role entities, which gives us more flexibility for sorting.

    • getAttributeNames

      public static List<String> getAttributeNames()
      A list of all attribute names in the system, used to populate the RangeInput in the AssignmentSearchDV detail view.

    • deleteAccounts

      public static void deleteAccounts(Account[] accounts)
      Removes the accounts.
      Parameters:
      accounts - The accounts to remove

    • getAllAccounts

      public static Account[] getAllAccounts()
      Returns a list of all Accounts.
      Returns:
      The list of accounts

    • deleteCustomerServiceTiers

      public static void deleteCustomerServiceTiers(CustomerServiceTierSpecialHandling[] custServiceSpecialHandling)
      Removes the CustomerServiceTiers.
      Parameters:
      custServiceSpecialHandling -

    • checkForDuplicateRolePrivileges

      public static String checkForDuplicateRolePrivileges(Role role)
      If the given role has duplicate privileges in its privileges array, returns an error message describing the first duplicate privilege found. Otherwise returns null.

      Using this method to validate the roles array doesn't help overall correctness - the database would reject the duplicate role in any case - but does improve the error message for the user.

    • exportAdminData

      public static void exportAdminData(ExportDataInfo info)
      Exports admin data based on the given export info object to an XML file.
